channeldata.description: This package installs clang compiler, lld linker, tools like llvm-ranlib, llvm-ar, bash, autoconf to compiler autotools on windows. Resulting packages will be MSVC compatible. To use this package, in meta.yaml    build:     skip: True   requirements:     build:       - vs2008_win-64       - autotools_clang_conda       - llvm-openmp  In bld.bat    call %BUILD_PREFIX%\Library\bin\run_autotools_clang_conda_build.bat   if errorlevel 1 exit 1  In build.sh    ./configure --prefix=$PREFIX   [[ "$target_platform" == "win-64" ]] && patch_libtool   make -j${CPU_COUNT}   make install
channeldata.summary: Scripts to compile autotools projects on windows using clang and llvm tools
